ModMetaData.name: ABF: Martial Synstructs
ModMetaData.author: Killathon
ModMetaData.description: Synstructs have long been integrated into human societies, including its violent tendencies. Synstructs who take a shine to battle partake in the martial traditions of humanity, and often find themselves desiring a more purpose-built body. No one lives forever, but their battle-ready frames sure make an attempt at it.
